tool_description: Fetch any Indian Vehicle’s challan in detail through it’s Registration Number/License Plate. This API has the capability to retrieve the below information,  Owner Name, Challan Number and its status, Vehicle Impound, offence names, penalty And much more.
name: RTO Challan Information Verification India
title: RTO Challan Information Verification India

api_list.name: challaninfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rto-challan-information-verification-india.p.rapidapi.com/api/rc/challaninfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rto-challan-information-verification-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://rto-challan-information-verification-india.p.rapidapi.com/api/rc/challaninfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
